# Pull Request (nx53)

**1. Type of Change:**
_What does this PR do? (Check one)_

- [ ] **Bug Fix** (e.g., Fixing a panic or logic error)
- [ ] **New Feature** (e.g., Adding a new CLI command or configuration option)
- [ ] **Documentation** (e.g., Updating README or code comments)
- [ ] **Code Refactor** (e.g., Cleaning up Rust code or dependencies)

**2. Related Issue:**
_Does this fix an existing issue? Please link it here (e.g., "Closes #24")._

>

**3. Summary of Changes:**
_Briefly explain what you changed and why. (e.g., "Fixed packet parsing under load," "Added support for detailed logging")_

>

**4. Verification & Testing:**
_How did you verify these changes?_

- [ ] I have built the project locally (`cargo build`) without errors.
- [ ] I have ran the tests (`cargo test`) and they pass.
- [ ] I have verified that the code is formatted (`cargo fmt --check`).
- [ ] (If applicable) I have manually tested the changes with real traffic.

**5. Screenshots (Optional):**
_If this is a visual change (e.g. CLI output), please paste a screenshot below to help us review it faster._

>

---

**Final Checklist:**

- [ ] I have read the [Contributing Guidelines](https://github.com/hapara-fail/nx53/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md).
- [ ] My code follows the project's style (clean Rust, idiomatic patterns).
